full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` AO RGYAN PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS, ,MDZAD PA'I MDOS GZHUNG CHUNG BA LAS, ,DGOS PA LA 'UR PHAN PHYIR 'DI, ,MDOS SKOR RIN CHEN BANG MDZOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016B ('BYOR BA CHE CHUNG 'GA' ZHIG PHAN SNYAN PAS, ,MDOS BSKOR RIN CHEN BANG MDZOD ZHES BYA BA, ,'DI NI YUL KHAMS MTHAR SKYES GYI NA BA, ,NGAG DBANG DPAL 'BYOR RIN CHEN GYIS SBYAR RO, ,'DI BRIS DGE BAS 'GRO KUN LAS NYON DBANG, ,BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON RKYEN NGAN BAR CHAD BSEL, ,TSE RING NAD MED TSE 'DIR BDE SKYID LDAN, ,'CHI TSE BLA MA MGON DANG BRAL MED SHOG ,GTO GLUD BTONG LA MKHAS PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS, ,TSE 'DI @017A *, ,LTO GOS PHYIR DU GZHAN NOR PHYUGS, ,BLANG BA'I THABS ZHES NGAN ZHING 'PHYA BA NA, ,CHOS KYI SBYIN PA LA SOGS 'DI TSANG NGO, ,DANG POR SEMS BSKYED NAS BZUNG STE, ,THA MA'I CHOS SBYIN BAR DU NI, ,LEGS PAR DPYAD NA CI 'GYUR SHES, ,DE PHYIR NAG BGROS BKOD PA'O,, ,,DGE'O,, ,,)
